channel.title: Network on My Awesome Site
channel.description: Recent content in Network on My Awesome Site

item.title: The Power of DNS (Domain Name System)
item.author: wildanpastioke@gmail.com (Wildan)
item.description: Solving a ‘undetected’ network problem with only one simple solution: Changing the DNS.

item.title: Managing Firewall in Linux with UFW (+GUFW)
item.author: wildanpastioke@gmail.com (Wildan)
item.description: A simple and user-friendly CLI firewall manager: UFW. It handles incoming to and outgoing traffic from our host machine.
